attributes.action: All Weddings Affected and those up coming UK and Destination Weddings Rembersed!
attributes.additional_details: I think it’s important for the government to recognise that individuals weddings both UK and Destination weddings are supported and given compensation or reimbursed, this must be considered and not set aside because the outbreak does not hold responsibility with the government, support and compensation should be considered and upheld, our weddings are an important aspect of many people’s lives and for those to loose their wedding at someone else’s gain is outrageous.
attributes.background: All our livelihoods, living, finances including individuals weddings both UK and Destination are being cancelled, this should be recognised as  couples are loosing thousands of pounds and cannot even get wedding insurance to cover the loss because insurance companies are not covering Coronovirus!

rejection.details:
We've tried to get in touch with you to talk about your petition but we didn't hear back. 

You can get in touch with us at petitionscommittee@parliament.uk if you'd like to resubmit your petition and want to talk about the contents first.
